text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 413 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use, residential-led scheme with a mix of retail, workspace and community uses. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – Town centre uses (Class E) – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Community facility – Improved crossings of the railway lines in the north of the site – Enhancements to public realm and Allen Gardens z The site is in multiple ownership and consists of a number of
